Turmeric Latte
600ml milk
1 tsp Turmeric
1/8 tsp Ground Ginger
1/2 tsp Cinammon
1/2 tsp Vanilla
1 pinch of salt
2 grinds Black Pepper
honey, to taste
  1. Bring everything except the honey to the boil, then simmer for 5 minutes
  2. Add honey to taste
  3. Froth or blend
